meanings.definition: A type of rose that produces clusters of small flowers.
meanings.sent1: In her garden, she planted a beautiful polyantha that bloomed with many small flowers.
meanings.sent2: The polyantha in the park had lovely clusters of tiny blooms.
meanings.sent3: The polyantha in the flower bed seemed to be showing off with its many small flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening blossomed like a polyantha, spreading joy in small clusters.
meanings.sent5: The polyantha's small flowers created a colorful carpet in the garden.

meanings.definition: A plant that belongs to the Polyantha group of roses.
meanings.sent1: The polyantha in her backyard was a proud member of the rose group.
meanings.sent2: The Polyantha roses in the garden were thriving under her care.
meanings.sent3: The Polyantha group of roses seemed to have a secret society in her garden.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite Polyantha rose stood out like a leader among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The Polyantha roses added a touch of elegance to her flower bed.
